actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The owl harpy makes two claw attacks and two talon attacks.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Talons
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Hovering Darkness
actions.desc: An owl harpy that hovers in flight can shake a fine, magical dander from her wings over a creature within 20 feet and directly below her. The creature must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or fall unconscious and be poisoned for 10 minutes. It wakes up if it takes damage or if a creature uses an action to shake it awake, but waking up doesn't end the poisoning.

actions.name: Luring Song
actions.desc: The owl harpy sings a magical melody. Every humanoid and giant within 300 feet of the harpy that can hear the song must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed until the song ends. The harpy must use a bonus action on its subsequent turns to continue singing. It can stop singing at any time. The song ends if the harpy becomes incapacitated. While charmed by the harpy, a target is incapacitated and ignores the songs of other harpies. A charmed target that is more than 5 feet away from the harpy must move at its highest rate (including dashing, if necessary) along the most direct route to get within 5 feet of the harpy. The charmed creature doesn't maneuver to avoid opportunity attacks, but it can repeat the saving throw every time it takes damage from anything other than the harpy. It also repeats the saving throw before entering damaging terrain (lava or a pit, for example), if the most direct route includes a dangerous space. A creature also repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns. A successful saving throw ends the effect on that creature and makes the creature immune to this harpy's song for 24 hours.

special_abilities.name: Quiet Flight
special_abilities.desc: The owl harpy gains an additional +3 to Stealth (+9 in total) while flying.

special_abilities.name: Dissonance
special_abilities.desc: The owl harpy can't use its blindsight while deafened.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
the owl harpy's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. The owl harpy can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

3/day: darkness

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The sand hag makes two claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must make a successful DC 12 Constitution saving throw or gain one level of exhaustion.

actions.name: Scouring Sirocco (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The sand hag generates a blast of hot wind in a 30-foot line or a 15-foot cone. Creatures inside it take 14 (4d6) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage and are blinded for 1 minute; a successful DC 14 Constitution saving throw halves the damage and negates the blindness. A blinded creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. The affected area (line or cone) is heavily obscured until the end of the sand hag's next turn.

actions.name: Change Shape
actions.desc: The hag polymorphs into a Small or Medium female humanoid, or back into her true form. Her statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment she is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. She reverts to her true form if she dies.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The sand hag has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
the sand hag's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

at will: invisibility

2/day each: hallucinatory terrain, major image

special_abilities.name: Mimicry
special_abilities.desc: The sand hag can mimic animal sounds and humanoid voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations only with a successful DC 14 Wisdom (Insight) check.

special_abilities.name: Scorpion Step
special_abilities.desc: The sand hag walks lightly across sandy surfaces, never sinking into soft sand or leaving tracks. When in sand terrain, the sand hag ignores difficult terrain, doesn't leave tracks, and gains tremorsense 30 ft.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The tosculi elite bow raider makes two longbow attacks or two claws attacks.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (3d8 + 4) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Deadly Precision
special_abilities.desc: The tosculi elite bow raider's ranged attacks do an extra 9 (2d8) damage (included below).

special_abilities.name: Evasive
special_abilities.desc: Ranged weapon attacks against the tosculi elite bow raider have disadvantage.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: The tosculi elite bow raider has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

special_abilities.name: Skirmisher
special_abilities.desc: The tosculi elite bow raider can Dash as a bonus action.

monsters.name: Water Elemental
monsters.damage_resistances: acid; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Whelm (Recharge 4-6)
actions.desc:
Each creature in the elemental's space must make a DC 15 Strength saving throw. On a failure, a target takes 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If it is Large or smaller, it is also grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and unable to breathe unless it can breathe water. If the saving throw is successful, the target is pushed out of the elemental's space.
The elemental can grapple one Large creature or up to two Medium or smaller creatures at one time. At the start of each of the elemental's turns, each target grappled by it takes 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. A creature within 5 feet of the elemental can pull a creature or object out of it by taking an action to make a DC 14 Strength and succeeding.

special_abilities.name: Water Form
special_abilities.desc: The elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

special_abilities.name: Freeze
special_abilities.desc: If the elemental takes cold damage, it partially freezes; its speed is reduced by 20 ft. until the end of its next turn.
